content.text: Any value bets for tonight's NBA games?

Strong value on Suns +4.5 (-110) vs Nuggets. Line opened at +6, sharp money pushing it down. Booker's scoring props also offer value - over 28.5 points at -115 with Beal out. Nuggets 3-7 ATS last 10 as home favorites. Weather in Denver (high altitude) suggests pace advantage for Suns, who've had 3 days rest.
Thoughts on tomorrow's Premier League matches?

Liverpool-Arsenal Total Goals Under 2.5 showing value at +120 (45.5% implied). Market heavily backing overs (78% tickets), but sharp money on under. Expected rain (15mm) impacts playing style. Both teams' xG trending down last 3 matches (Liverpool: 1.2, Arsenal: 1.4). Referee Michael Oliver averages 2.3 goals/match this season.
Best prop bets for NFL Sunday?

Chiefs-Raiders game presents multiple prop opportunities. Kelce over 6.5 receptions (-125) stands out - he's hit this in 7/8 games vs Raiders. Weather forecast (18mph winds) suggests short passing game. Also eyeing Raiders 1H +3.5 (-110) - they're 8-2 ATS first half as home dogs under current coach. Shop around - seeing +7.5 alt line at +135 on some books.
